title: How Many Calories Are in a Boba Drink?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a boba drink, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and tweaks for variations like low-sugar options.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Boba Drink?
assumptions: Standard 16 oz milk tea boba drink with black tea, whole milk, tapioca pearls, and moderate sugar syrup; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shop, size, milk type, sweetness level, and boba portion. Check menus or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical boba drink has about 450 kcal, mostly from sugars and milk.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Non-dairy milk (e.g., almond milk) instead of whole milk

faqs.q: How many calories are in a boba drink?
faqs.a: Around 450 kcal for a standard 16 oz milk tea with boba.

faqs.q: Are boba drinks high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 60 g of sugars per drink from syrup and milk.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a boba drink?
faqs.a: About 5 g, mainly from the milk base.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in boba drinks?
faqs.a: Larger sizes (e.g., 24 oz) can add 100-200 kcal; opt for small to reduce.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie boba drink?
faqs.a: Choose less sugar, non-dairy milk, or fresh tea without pearls to cut 100-200 kcal.
